original_text: The Lord has filled him with his Spirit so that he has special skills. He knows how to make many kinds of things. The Lord has filled him with his Spirit so that he has special skills. He knows how to make many kinds of things. The Lord has filled him with his Spirit so that he has special skills. He knows how to make many kinds of things.
korean_text: 하나님의 영을 그에게 충만하게 하여 지혜와 총명과 지식으로 여러 가지 일을 하게 하시되

sentences.original_text: The Lord has filled him with his Spirit
so that he has special skills
He knows how to make many kinds of things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여러 종류의 것들을 만드는 방법을 안다
